info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 4 at 1:19PM CDT until July 4 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo TX
info.description:
FFWSJT
The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... East Central Mason County in west central Texas...
* Until 430 PM CDT.
* At 118 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 4 and 10 inches of rain have fallen in the immediate area, with up to 18 inches upstream of this location. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area, and any additional rainfall will only exacerbate the ongoing flooding. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Llano River south of Mason. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hedwigs Hill.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR LLANO RIVER SOUTH OF MASON
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 4:30 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 4:30 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR LLANO RIVER SOUTH OF MASON
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 4:30 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 4:30 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
